triples.evidence: The term simply means we are summing up contributions along a single ray of X-rays as it travels through the object.
In the limit, what we measure is a line integral of the attenuation coefficient along the path of the X-ray.

evidence: In other words, in the limit, what we measure is a line integral of the attenuation coefficient along the path of the X-ray.
triples.o: integral of the attenuation coefficient along the path of the X-ray
